description:
5:00 is a game where you have to survive for 5 minutes or time rewinds to the point when you woke up, there's clues as to what is going to kill you so you could pass the game on the first go, or it could be really hard idk, honestly though its  not a great game but its my first and I had fun and learned a lot making it.

Controls:

WASD movement

left click to interact/use

right click to drop

alt - f4 to quit
